Proposed Solution: Avoid the use of face verification.

Proposed Solution: Avoid the use of swipe gestures.

Proposed Solution: Increase the text size throughout the application.

Proposed Solution: Provide options to translate in-app text into local languages.

Proposed Solution: Integrate age-friendly design elements.

Proposed Solution: Ensure system stability through rigorous pre-release testing of updates.

Proposed Solution: Implement secure and usable biometric authentication.

Proposed Solution: Provide clearer information about risks and support.

Proposed Solution: Combine multi-screen instructions into a single interface.
